pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model Wrappers for Discriminant Analysis // Bindings for additional classification models for use with the 'parsnip' package. Models include flavors of discriminant analysis, such as linear (Fisher (1936) doi:10.1111/j.1469-1809.1936.tb02137.x), regularized (Friedman (1989) doi:10.1080/01621459.1989.10478752), and flexible (Hastie, Tibshirani, and Buja (1994) doi:10.1080/01621459.1994.10476866), as well as naive Bayes classifiers (Hand and Yu (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1751-5823.2001.tb00465.x).
